definitions.text: a tendency to express warm and affectionate feeling
a pain that is felt (as when the area is touched)
examples: the best results are generally obtained by inserting the needle into the point of maximum tenderness
after taking a cold, rawness of the larynx and trachea come on
he had trouble expressing the affection he felt
the warmness of his welcome made us feel right at home

definitions.text: a feeling of concern for the welfare of someone (especially someone defenseless)
